rows.3-WEEK SPRINT: FROM ZERO TO LIVE: Compressed timeline. Assumes imagination asset already exists and CoS brings capital.
1. Imagination asset EXISTS. 694-tab Trade is filled. It's not perfect but it's complete.
This is already true as of today.
2. M0 (Trade Thesis) is LOCKED. The bet is defined. No strategy changes during sprint.
3. Nilo has a warm network of potential CoS candidates or a channel to reach them fast.
The CoS is the bottleneck. Everything depends on finding the right person in Week 1.

rows.col_2: Action
Post VA job (Upwork, test task, $100 perf basis + bonus)
Activate CoS pipeline. Warm intros, DMs, cold outreach.
Screen VA applicants. Top 3 get test task.
CoS conversations. Frame the opportunity. Send Start Here + M0.
Hire VA. Best test task wins. Kickoff call.
CoS finalist interviews. Assessment workbook.
VA begins: CoS onboarding prep, entity formation research, systems setup.
rows.col_4: Onboarding packet ready. Entity checklist started.

rows.col_2: CoS signs. Capital commitment confirmed (theirs or from their network).
VA gets bonus for hitting Week 1 milestones on time.

rows.3-WEEK SPRINT: FROM ZERO TO LIVE: Week 1 output: VA working. CoS signed. Capital committed. Entity in process.
Nilo's time: ~10-12 hours total across 5 days.

rows.col_2: Action
CoS onboards. Claude Project walkthrough. Learns Trade structure via Claude.
rows.col_4: CoS can navigate Trade through Claude.

rows.col_2: Entity formed (LLC, EIN). VA handles filings.
CoS maps their network: experts, investors, potential operators.
rows.col_4: Warm intro list. 15-20 names across domains.

rows.col_2: VA sets up Shopify skeleton, domain, email, basic tool stack.
CoS sends expert briefs (via PM Brief Template). Books 4-6 sessions for Week 3.
rows.col_4: Expert sessions scheduled. Cluster coverage planned.

rows.col_2: CoS reaches out to 3-5 potential operators from their network.
CoS + Nilo check-in. Review progress. Adjust Week 3 plan.
Bank account opened. Capital deposited. VA and CoS first payments processed.

rows.3-WEEK SPRINT: FROM ZERO TO LIVE: Week 2 output: CoS fully operational. Entity live. Expert sessions booked. Operator pipeline open.
Nilo's time: ~2 hours (Friday check-in + async Slack).

rows.col_2: Action
Expert session #1 (Cluster A: Finance or Cluster B: Product)
rows.col_4: First cluster at A-grade or clear revision list.

rows.col_2: Claude incorporates feedback immediately. Revised draft same day.
Expert session #2 + #3 (two clusters in one day)
Expert session #4. Investor intro conversations begin.
rows.col_4: Four clusters reviewed. Investor pipeline open.

rows.col_2: Operator candidate interviews begin.
Expert session #5 + #6. Remaining clusters.
Claude revises all remaining models from expert feedback.
Nilo reviews proprietary models (M0, M1, M32-34, M38-39).
Sprint retrospective. What is A-grade, what needs more work.
rows.col_4: Trade status: validated. Next steps clear.

rows.3-WEEK SPRINT: FROM ZERO TO LIVE: Week 3 output: Trade expert-validated. Investor conversations live. Operator pipeline active.
TOTAL NILO TIME ACROSS 3 WEEKS: ~15-18 hours.
After Week 3, Nilo drops to ~1 hour/week (CoS check-in + async).
